about.summary: NumPy-based text/binary PLY file reader/writer for Python

name: plyfile
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "plyfile" %}
{% set version = "0.7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 84ba5ee8c70a4924f64aa7edff5764b929f3b7842d53a3197d0b753818ad7089

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - numpy

test:
  imports:
    - plyfile

about:
  home: https://github.com/dranjan/python-plyfile
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: 'NumPy-based text/binary PLY file reader/writer for Python'
  dev_url: https://github.com/dranjan/python-plyfile

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mdraw
